com.snamp.hosting

Enum ConfigurationFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ConfigurationFormat>
      • com.snamp.hosting.ConfigurationFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ConfigurationFormat>

    public enum ConfigurationFormat
extends java.lang.Enum<ConfigurationFormat>
    Represents configuration file parser.

    This enum is an entry point for organizing agent configuration persistence. The following example demonstrates how to read agent configuration stored in YAML file:

    final AgentConfiguration config = ConfigurationFormat.load("yaml", "~/docs/snamp.yaml");

    The current version of SNAMP supports the two persistent configuration formats:
    • YAML markup.
    • Binary file (serialization/deserialization of EmbeddedAgentConfiguration.

    Since:
    1.0

      BINARY

      YAML
      Represents YAML-formatted SNAMP agent configuration file.
